description: Italian residents tell the BBC they are confused by government measures to tackle the outbreak.
title: Coronavirus: Confusion and fear sweep through Italy amid lockdown
title_page: Coronavirus: Confusion and fear sweep through Italy amid lockdown - BBC News
maintext: "One day they say one thing, and the next day they do just the opposite," she told the BBC. "One day they say we are in a terrible period, and the next day they say it is not so bad."
